snippet: The Hedvig Mollestad Trio, from Norway, mixes Black Sabbath and jazz inflections, and Marc Cary, long an accompanist, issues his first solo piano album.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews Hedvig Mollestad Trio album All of Them Witches, For the Love of Abbey from jazz pianist Marc Cary, Wheelhouse release Boss of the Plains, bassist Eric Revis album City of Asylum and Azure from pianist Marilyn Crispell and bassist Gary Peacock.
lead_paragraph: The Hedvig Mollestad Trio, from Norway, mixes Black Sabbath and jazz inflections, and Marc Cary, long an accompanist, issues his first solo piano album.

headline.seo: Albums by Hedvig Mollestad Trio, Marc Cary and Wheelhouse
headline.main: Heavy-Metal Jazz, and an Homage to Abbey Lincoln
headline.print_headline: Heavy-Metal Jazz, and an Homage to Abbey Lincoln
